CustomField.description: The number of source records to run through the target action at a time. Correlates to the apex batch job size. Can be between 1 and 200. Same concept as Data Loader's batch size.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of source records to run through the target action at a time. Correlates to the apex batch job size. Can be between 1 and 200. Same concept as Data Loader's batch size.
CustomField.label: Batch Size
